title: Eco-Friendly Disposable 100ml Rice Bran Cups
description:
🌿 Crafted with Nature in Mind

Experience sustainability at its finest with our 100ml disposable cups, thoughtfully made from rice bran, a renewable and biodegradable material.

✨ Why Choose These Cups?

  • 🌱 Material: 100% natural rice bran, ensuring eco-friendliness without compromising quality.
  • 📏 Capacity: Perfectly sized at 100ml, ideal for serving your favorite beverages.
  • ⚖️ Weight: Lightweight yet durable at just 25 grams.
  • ⏳ Duration: Stays sturdy for 30+ minutes, giving you ample time to enjoy your drink.
  • 🔥 Temperature Support: Expertly insulates hot or cold beverages, maintaining temperatures up to 80°C or optimal drinking levels.

🚫 Note: Not suitable for water storage. Best for instant serving.

🌏 Sustainability in Every Sip

Whether you're hosting an event or running a café, these cups are the perfect blend of convenience and care for the planet. Embrace the eco-chic lifestyle while ensuring your beverages are served with style and responsibility.

title: Eco-Friendly Disposable 7-Inch Rice Bran & Rice Husk Plates
description:
🌿 Sustainable Dining with Rice Bran & Rice Husk

Redefine eco-conscious living with our durable and biodegradable 7-inch disposable plates, crafted from a harmonious blend of rice bran and rice husk.

✨ Why Choose These Plates?

  • 🌱 Material: Made from 100% natural rice bran and rice husk, combining strength and sustainability.
  • 📏 Size: Compact 7-inch diameter, ideal for appetizers, desserts, and light servings.
  • ⚖️ Weight: Lightweight yet durable at 45 grams.
  • ⏳ Duration: Stays functional for 45+ minutes to 1 hour, ideal for all types of meals.
  • 🍽️ Usage: Perfectly designed to handle all kinds of foods, whether hot, cold, or room temperature.

🌏 Sustainability in Every Bite

Elevate your dining experience with plates that are as stylish as they are sustainable. Compact and eco-friendly, these are perfect for casual and formal dining needs.
